name: Pixel Princess Blitz
storyline:
"The Kingdom of Verad has fallen into a state of total chaos.
The Irsil occupiers are making their final push against the remnants of the army.
a foul plague is creeping across the lands,
and hostile creatures are crawling out of the darkest corners of the Kingdom.
Now, when the dangers finally reach Hummingwood,
Kuruna's adventure begins..."
summary:
'PIXEL PRINCESS BLITZ' is a fantasy-themed roguelike action RPG.
It is inspired by awesome games such as 'D&D: Shadow over Mystara', 'FTL: Faster Than Light', and 'The Legend of Zelda'. 
Featuring a combination of hack 'n' slash, dungeon crawling and a TRPG-spiced dynamic story, this game is intended to be a real treat for every gamer who loves roguelikes or traditional RPGs, and isn't afraid of challenges.
